'''Pinecones''' are a [[Cooking Ingredient]] found in the wild in [[Teyvat]].

==How to Obtain==
Pinecones are most often found at the base of trees or in critter hideouts throughout Teyvat, and are by far most common in [[Mondstadt]].

See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=125 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
